Title: Relates to waiving certain fees associated with the issuance of an enhanced driver's license
Summary: Relates to waiving all additional fees associated with the issuance of an enhanced driver's license if such license is required within thirty days of the issuance or reissuance of a standard driver's license.
LawCode: Amd ยง503, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to waiving certain fees associated with the issuance of an enhanced driver's license
